abstract: James Forbes will be vice chairman of UBS Group Americas. It is the second time in recent weeks that UBS has poached an executive from Bank of America.
snippet: James Forbes will be vice chairman of UBS Group Americas. It is the second time in recent weeks that UBS has poached an executive from Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: UBS is replenishing its ranks in America.

headline.main: UBS Lures Away Bank of America Executive
